title: Hydrogen production via methanol steam reforming using sepiolite-derived Cu-based spherical micro-mesoporous catalysts
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3944-3963
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00526K, Paper
Mingqiang Chen, Jinheng Yao, Yishuang Wang, Defang Liang, Lulu Shen, Chuanlong Chen, Chang Li, Haosheng Xin, Gang Yuan, Jun Wang
Hydrogen production via MSR has been achieved over spherical micro-mesoporous supported CuMn catalysts using sepiolite-derived silica. Cuâ€“MnOx interfaces inhibit the excessive oxidation of Cu0 to supply active Cu+ and oxygen vacancies.
